Description.div:
MoveRequestKey identifies the move request to which this status audit belongs. This is the unique key of the YFS_Move_Request_Status_Audit table.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if MoveRequestKey not passed alongwith OldStatus and NewStatus.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if Move request status audit for the passed MoveRequestKey does not exist in the database.

Primary key attribute of YFS_Move_Request_Status_Audit table.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if MoveRequestStatusAuditKey is passed but not exist in the database.

NewStatus indicates new status of the move request. This is the unique key of the YFS_Move_Request_Status_Audit table.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if NewStatus not passed alongwith MoveRequestKey and OldStatus.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if Move request status audit for the passed NewStatus does not exist in the database.

OldStatus indicates old status of the move request. This is the unique key of the YFS_Move_Request_Status_Audit table.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if OldStatus not passed alongwith MoveRequestKey and NewStatus.
Either primary key (MoveRequestStatusAuditKey) or all attributes of unique key (MoveRequestKey, OldStatus and NewStatus) must be passed. Error if Move request status audit for the passed OldStatus does not exist in the database.
